definition: invite the talented and call the valorous (idiom); to recruit talent
to recruit/to provoke/to beckon/to incur/to infect/contagious/a move (chess)/a maneuver/device/trick/to confess
worthy or virtuous person/honorific used for a person of the same or a younger generation
to receive/to accept/to enjoy/to bring into/to pay (tax etc)/nano- (one billionth)/to reinforce sole of shoes or stockings by close sewing
member of the senior ministerial class (old)/scholar (old)/bachelor/honorific/soldier/noncommissioned officer/specialist worker

sentences.english: Hundreds of enterprises and institutions from the province and beyond came to choose suitable people.
sentences.chinese: 省內外數百家企事業單位前來招賢納士。

sentences.english: This company subordinate Weifang marketing department, solicits the best-qualified workers in Weifang accepts the gentleman.
sentences.chinese: 本公司下屬濰坊市場部，在濰坊招賢納士。

sentences.english: Hundreds of enterprises and institutions within and outside of the province came to choose talented people.
sentences.chinese: 省內外數百家企事業單位前來招賢納士。
所以招賢納士是第一位。

sentences.english: Hundreds of enterprises and institutions within( both in side ) and outside of the province came to choose talented people.
sentences.chinese: 省內外數百家企事業單位前來招賢納士。
